DOC.brief_summary: The study will examine whether the effects of computerized brain training are enhanced when training is combined with mild brain stimulation in patients with mild cognitive impairment. We hypothesize that this combination will produce greater improvements in cognitive functioning than computerized brain training alone.
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation to Enhance Cognition in Mild Cognitive Impairment
DOC.criteria: Aged 60 85 years. Meet diagnostic criteria for amnestic mild cognitive impairment. Inability to provide informed consent. Concurrent medication likely to affect mental performance. Current substance use or dependence in last 3 months. Current active psychiatric or neurological condition
